description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Narrative of Military Operations directed, during the late war between the States, by J. E. Johnston ... Illustrated, etc" Author: JOHNSTON, Joseph Eggleston. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9605.cc.7." Page: 183 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1874 Publisher: D. Appleton and Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001889000 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
